# iNZightTools
[![Travis-CI Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/iNZightVIT/iNZightTools.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/iNZightVIT/iNZightTools)
[![Coverage status](https://codecov.io/gh/iNZightVIT/iNZightTools/branch/master/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/github/iNZightVIT/iNZightTools?branch=master)
[![License: GPL v3](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-GPL%20v3-blue.svg)](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0)

Functions for integration of iNZight GUI to iNZight packages.

```{r features, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
if (!requireNamespace("git2r", quietly = TRUE)) {
    cat("Whoever compiled this doesn't have a working copy of `git2r`, so I can't show you.")
} else {
    branches <- git2r::branches(flags = "remote")
    branches <- gsub("origin/", "", sapply(branches, function(x) x$name))
    branches <- branches[grepl("feature/", branches)]
    if (length(branches))
        cat("## New features in progress\n\n")
    for (branch in branches) {
        cat(sprintf("* %s  [![Travis-CI Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/iNZightVIT/iNZightTools.svg?branch=%s)](https://travis-ci.org/iNZightVIT/iNZightTools/branches) [![Coverage status](https://codecov.io/gh/iNZightVIT/iNZightTools/branch/%s/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/github/iNZightVIT/iNZightTools?branch=%s)\n", branch, branch, branch, branch))
    }
}
```
